articles.title: Get ready to scream: Halloween Horror Nights at Universal Studios Singapore is back after a two-year hiatus - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: The yearly ghostly affair at Universal Studios Singapore is back with more – besides the usual horror houses, visitors to the theme park can look forward to a new laser tag challenge, zombie scare zones and a horror-theme dining experience.
articles.content: Universal Studios Singapores Halloween Horror Nights is finally back for its 10th edition this year. Its last instalment was in 2019, before the COVID-19 pandemic. From Sep 30 to Nov 5, on selected n… [+496 chars]

articles.title: A beginner's guide to campervanning in Australia: How to plan and enjoy the great outdoors on wheels - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: It’s all about spontaneity, but a little planning can’t hurt. Here’s a guide to campervanning for beginners who may not have gone camping before.
articles.content: We stayed in most of these campervan parks on a walk-in basis, but I recommend booking in advance when travelling during the holiday season or to areas where demand will outweigh supply. Discovery Pa… [+1807 chars]

articles.title: K-pop group Super Junior to perform in Singapore on Sep 3 - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: Super Junior fans, you will be Sorry, Sorry if you miss their one-night-only show.
articles.content:
Super news for ELFs. K-pop group Super Junior, or SuJu as they are fondly known, will return to Singapore in September as part of their concert tour, Super Junior World Tour - Super Show 9: Road.

articles.title: Ghostlore: In this made-in-Singapore video game, you get to fight hungry ghosts and pontianaks - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: We speak to Andrew Teo, the creator of Ghostlore, on what it took to make this love letter to Southeast Asian folklore.
articles.content: Ghostlore now boasts a procedurally generated world with detailed item and character customisation systems reminiscent of Diablo. The maps feature well-known landmarks like the Merlion and shophouses… [+1717 chars]
